Package controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
controller.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
The main controller of the program. Each of the functions in the game function similar to a "in game command"

    • Game

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • setUp

      public void setUp​(View observer, int levelNumber)
      Sets up the board with the given observer, and level.
      Parameters:
      observer - A view to add to the new board
      levelNumber - A level number from the book. Note: not all of those are available.

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece​(Move move, boolean applyChangesView)
      Moves the point at the start point of move to the end point of move.
      Parameters:
      move - the move representing the change being applied to the board
      applyChangesView - whether a move should be reflected on-screen. When dealing with the GUI it is true; for internal logic such as a graph solution or tests it is false

    • movePiece

      private void movePiece​(Move move, boolean addToUndoHistory, boolean applyChangesView)
      Helper function to process the move request.
      Parameters:
      move - the move representing the change being applied to the board
      addToUndoHistory - whether to store an equivalent undo command for the move
      applyChangesView - whether a move should be reflected on-screen. When dealing with the GUI it is true;

    • getMoves

      public java.util.List<Move> getMoves​(java.awt.Point point)
      Get the list of possible moves for the given point, which will be non-empty if there is a movable piece at that point.
      Parameters:
      point - the point that was clicked on the GUI
      Returns:
      a list of possible moves

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel​(View observer, int levelNumber)
      Set the level of game to the passed in level.
      Parameters:
      observer - the view reference
      levelNumber - the level to set the game to

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel​(View observer)
      Reset the game to the passed in level.
      Parameters:
      observer - A view to add to the new board

    • hint

      public java.util.Optional<Move> hint()
      Gets the hint for the next move that has to be applied to get closer to the winning board.
      Returns:
      If there is a hint for the next move (solution has been generated and current board is not winning), then return that move.

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redo an undo that was previously made.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undo a move that was previously made.

    • gameWon

      public boolean gameWon()
      Returns whether the current board is the victory board.
      Returns:
      true if the current board is a victory board.
